AntiSeptix PRO Hand Sanitiser Ready-to-Use 500ml

Professional grade, powerful hand sanitiser

Buy Now

A food-grade, non-toxic, vegan, non-alcohol hand sanitiser which kills 99.9% of bacteria, fungus and viruses, including E.coli, salmonella, coronavirus, poliovirus, norovirus and flu while leaving no chemical or alcohol residue.

  1. Pump one squirt into the palm of your hand
  2. Rub the sanitiser into your hands
  3. Allow to air dry

  • External use only.
  • When using this product, keep out of eyes, ears and mouth.
  • In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • If Swallowed seek medical attention if you feel unwell.

  • Electrochemically activated saline solution with >0.1% w/v saline

  • Store between 15-30C out of direct sunlight.
  • Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40oC.
  • Once open use within 12 months.

Features

Kills Viruses (coronavirus, poliovirus, norovirus, flu, adenovirus)

Covid-19

Kills Bacteria (e. coli, salmonella)

Kills Fungus

Non-Toxic – safe for your skin

Child safe

Food safe

Vegan

Pet safe

100% natural

FAQs

Yes. AntiSeptix Hand Sanitiser is food safe.

No. AntiSeptix Hand Sanitiser does not contain alcohol.

Yes, AntiSeptix Hand Sanitiser is Halal.

Yes. All AntiSeptix products have demonstrated effectiveness against the Covid-19 virus (SARS-CoV-2) when used in accordance with the directions for use.

How to Use

  1. Pump one squirt into the palm of your hand
  2. Rub the sanitiser into your hands
  3. Allow to air dry

Ingredients

  • Electrochemically activated saline solution with >0.1% w/v saline

Safety Instructions

  • External use only.
  • When using this product, keep out of eyes, ears and mouth.
  • In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • If Swallowed seek medical attention if you feel unwell.

Storage

  • Store between 15-30C out of direct sunlight.
  • Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40oC.
  • Once open use within 12 months.
